newsitem.title: USA: U.S. soybean weekly export sales highlights--USDA.
newsitem.headline: U.S. soybean weekly export sales highlights--USDA.

text.p: USDA soybean export sales highlights in latest reporting week:

Net sales of 65,800 MT were 59 percent above the prior week, but 37 percent below the 4-week average. Major increases for Venezuela (60,500 MT), Trinidad (27,000 MT), and South Korea (20,000 MT) were partially offset by reductions for unknown destinations (54,500 MT).
Sales of 264,300 MT for delivery during the 1997/98 marketing year were mainly for unknown destinations (102,000 MT), the Netherlands (67,100 MT), and Thailand (50,000 MT).

Exports of 247,500 MT were 38 percent above the previous week and 3 percent above the 4-week average. The primary destinations were Mexico (105,300 MT), South Korea (55,000 MT), and Japan (54,600 MT).
